text.section: Each employment agency shall indicate, on each form that the employment agency uses, that it is an employment agency.

In a contract between an employment agency and a client, the term "acceptance of position by applicant" means:
commencement of work by a client; or
an agreement between a client and employer for the client to begin work on a fixed date at an agreed remuneration.
In each contract between an employment agency and a client, the employment agency shall state the fee that the employment agency charges the client for placement by the employment agency.
